You sell your starting boots and pants for a whopping fifty credits, to a total of 179. You wonder, for approximately three seconds, if anyone's ever sold their pants to buy a potion.

“One more thing, before I go.” You say. “Could I combine these plates and armor scraps to make a light shield? Or apply worm teeth to my boots for better climbing?”

“You would not be satisfied with either result.” It says. “Those armor scraps could be used to decorate, or perhaps enhance, a small shield or a weapon such as a dagger or knife. Not even my great skill can predict the results, and cannot promise they would be more than cosmetic.”
